activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10532
activity.text:
Hi @khavinshankar, @nihal467, and @Jacobjeevan,

I'm really excited about the Integrate UHI as a Plug project and would love to contribute! The concept of integrating UHI APIs to create a seamless healthcare service experience aligns with my interest in building scalable and efficient solutions.

I have hands-on experience with ReactJS, NodeJS, TypeScript, and API integrations, and Iâ€™ve worked on projects involving payment gateway integration, authentication, and data synchronization. My recent work includes integrating Razorpay for payments, implementing modular plug interfaces, and ensuring seamless backend-frontend communication.

I'm particularly interested in contributing to UHI API integration, service discovery workflows, and the plug interface design. I'd love to start by understanding UHI protocols and exploring how they can be efficiently integrated into CARE.

Looking forward to collaborating with the team and making an impact on this project! ðŸš€

Best,
